daily_sevak_vichar.title: Sevak ka Arambh
daily_sevak_vichar.vichar: Bhakti ka arambh tab hota hai jab ahankar chup ho jata hai. Sevak banna hi sabse badi sadhana hai.
daily_sevak_vichar.reflection: Aaj apne har karm ko seva maan kar karein.

daily_sevak_vichar.title: Bhav ka Mulya
daily_sevak_vichar.vichar: Bhagwan ko shabd nahi, bhav chahiye. Shuddh bhav me ki gayi seva swayam pooja ban jaati hai.
daily_sevak_vichar.reflection: Aaj ek kaam sirf prem se karein.

daily_sevak_vichar.title: Smaran ki Shakti
daily_sevak_vichar.vichar: Jahan mann bhagwan ka smaran karta hai, wahan bhay tik nahi pata. Smaran hi raksha hai.
daily_sevak_vichar.reflection: Chalte chalte naam ka smaran karein.

daily_sevak_vichar.title: Surrender
daily_sevak_vichar.vichar: Jab sab apne haath me rakhna chhod dete hain, tab bhagwan ka haath pakad pate hain.
daily_sevak_vichar.reflection: Aaj ek chinta bhagwan ko saunp dein.

daily_sevak_vichar.title: Seva ka Phal
daily_sevak_vichar.vichar: Sevak phal nahi poochta, sevak bhagwan par chhod deta hai. Yahi uski shanti hai.
daily_sevak_vichar.reflection: Phal ki ichha chhod kar karm karein.

daily_sevak_vichar.title: Antar ki Yatra
daily_sevak_vichar.vichar: Bahar bhatakne se pehle andar jhaankna seekhein. Bhakti antar se shuru hoti hai.
daily_sevak_vichar.reflection: Do minute aankh band kar ke baithiye.

daily_sevak_vichar.title: Vishwas
daily_sevak_vichar.vichar: Bhagwan par poora vishwas ho to akelaapan bhi sath ban jata hai.
daily_sevak_vichar.reflection: Aaj har paristhiti me vishwas rakhein.

daily_sevak_vichar.title: Naam ki Madhurta
daily_sevak_vichar.vichar: Naam ka uchcharan nahi, ras ka anubhav hona chahiye. Naam me hi bhagwan ka vaas hai.
daily_sevak_vichar.reflection: Naam ko mehsoos kar ke japein.

daily_sevak_vichar.title: Vinamrta
daily_sevak_vichar.vichar: Vinamr sevak bhagwan ke sabse nikat hota hai. Jhukna kamzori nahi, bhakti hai.
daily_sevak_vichar.reflection: Aaj apne ego ko thoda shaant karein.

daily_sevak_vichar.title: Dhairya
daily_sevak_vichar.vichar: Bhagwan ka samay sahi hota hai, bas hume dhairya seekhna hota hai.

daily_sevak_vichar.title: Shanti
daily_sevak_vichar.vichar: Shanti bahar nahi milti, shanti bhagwan ke smaran se utarti hai.
daily_sevak_vichar.reflection: Aaj kam bolein, zyada mehsoos karein.

daily_sevak_vichar.title: Tyag
daily_sevak_vichar.vichar: Jo chhodna seekh leta hai, wahi paane yogya ban jata hai. Bhakti tyag se gehri hoti hai.
daily_sevak_vichar.reflection: Aaj ek vasana ka tyag karein.

daily_sevak_vichar.title: Karuna
daily_sevak_vichar.vichar: Sevak ka hriday karuna se bhara hota hai. Karuna hi bhagwan ka swaroop hai.

daily_sevak_vichar.title: Ekagra Mann
daily_sevak_vichar.vichar: Jahan mann tik jata hai, wahi bhakti phalti hai. Ekagra mann hi sadhana hai.
daily_sevak_vichar.reflection: Ek kaam ek mann se karein.

daily_sevak_vichar.title: Marg par Chalna
daily_sevak_vichar.vichar: Sevak ka kaam pahunchna nahi, marg par chalna hai. Chalna hi kripa hai.
daily_sevak_vichar.reflection: Aaj bas marg par bane rahen.

dukh.question: Bhagwan, dukh itna kyu hai?
dukh.answer: Kyunki tumne mujhe yaad karna dukh ke baad seekha hai, pehle nahi.

dukh.question: Main thak gaya hoon.
dukh.answer: Jab tum thakte ho, tabhi mujhe yaad karte ho — wahi meri bulahat hai.

dukh.question: Kya main akela hoon?
dukh.answer: Tum mujhe bhool jaate ho, par main tumhe kabhi nahi bhoolta.

dukh.question: Dard kab khatam hoga?
dukh.answer: Jab tum dard ko mujhe saunp doge.

dukh.question: Main kyun rota hoon?
dukh.answer: Kyunki aansuon se hriday halka hota hai, phir bhakti utarti hai.

vishwas.question: Mujh par bharosa kaise rakhu?
vishwas.answer: Mujh par bharosa rakho, tum swayam sambhal jaoge.

vishwas.question: Kya aap mere saath ho?
vishwas.answer: Main tumhare saath nahi, tumhare andar hoon.

vishwas.question: Jab sab chhod dete hain?
vishwas.answer: Tab main tumhe thaam leta hoon.

vishwas.question: Bharosa toot jata hai.
vishwas.answer: Insaan par tha, mujh par nahi.

vishwas.question: Vishwas kamzor ho raha hai.
vishwas.answer: Naam ka smaran badhao, vishwas swayam badega.

vasana.question: Main apne mann ko kyu nahi jeet pata?
vasana.answer: Kyunki tum use dabate ho, samarpit nahi karte.

vasana.question: Galti baar-baar kyu hoti hai?
vasana.answer: Kyunki abhyaas kam hai, kripa nahi.

vasana.question: Kaamna rukti nahi.
vasana.answer: Naam me ras badhao, vasana dheemi padegi.

vasana.question: Main sudhar paunga?
vasana.answer: Jo mujhe yaad karta hai, wahi badalta hai.

naam_smaran.meaning: Jo hriday me vishram deta hai
